channel.title: Bread on Paul Czarkowski
channel.description: Recent content in Bread on Paul Czarkowski

item.title: BreadOps - Continuous Delivery of Fresh Baked Bread
item.description: “See how this sparkly devop princess bakes bread every day with almost no effort at all with this one weird trick” Store bought bread is shit. Even the “artisanal” bread at most supermarkets is little better than cake baked in a bread shaped mold ( seriously check next time you’re at a supermarket ). You might be lucky and have a really good bread baker near you, but like butchers and other important crafts they have all but disappeared.
